snippet: Twitter data is potentially lucrative for the global communications business. It can inform about when to serve up advertisements on the site and for what kinds of products. It also produces cool graphs and charts.
abstract: Twitter data is potentially lucrative for the global communications business. It can inform about when to serve up advertisements on the site and for what kinds of products. It also produces cool graphs and charts.

headline.main: Twitter Knows When You Sleep, and More
headline.print_headline: Twitter Finds Sleep Patterns In Four Cities
